jobs.content:
Are you are looking for innovation? Do you seek to work with passionate and talented individuals? Then join the Kisura family and help us create the game changer in online fashion!


Launched in May 2013, Kisura is the first personal shopping platform for women. By combining tradition and innovation, we offer our customers a first-class shopping experience. Working with a complex user and product database we are able to offer our customers handpicked outfits.


Well-known investors and e-commerce experts back us. We have a strong network of suppliers and partners.


As a frontend developer at Kisura you will be working on frontend tasks, extending and maintaining our platform to the next level. You should be comfortable in a fluid start-up environment and bring an energetic, fun and creative approach to your work.

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer - Unleash your skills
jobs.content: StackState is growing. With you, we want to develop two products: a web scale IT Operations platform and our own Graph database, which will be made open source. We offer you the freedom to expand and unleash your expertise and personal skills. A unique opportunity to conquer the world with a new and challenging product.

jobs.title: Software Engineer .NET
jobs.content:
Voor zowel onze divisie Finance (Deventer, Utrecht en Zwolle) als Zorg (Deventer) zijn wij op zoek naar eigenwijze .NET software ontwikkelaars.


Wat ga je doen?


Als software ontwikkelaar ben je een actief lid van een projectteam, het team bestaat uit een gezonde mix van junior, medior en senior collega’s. Jouw eigen ideeën en kennis van techniek krijgen alle kans om in de praktijk te worden toegepast.


Bij Topicus is software ontwikkelen meer dan programmeren alleen. Dankzij onze op Agile en SCRUM gebaseerde projectaanpak zijn we in staat snel en doelgericht applicaties te realiseren. We werken graag met de nieuwste frameworks en technieken van Microsoft. Zo gebruiken we .Net 4.5, SQL Server 2012, het Microsoft MVC framework en de Razor engine. Hiermee kunnen we op een makkelijke en robuuste manier webapplicaties ontwikkelen. Daarnaast maken we gebruik van HTML5 en jQuery, wat standaard wordt meegeleverd in het MVC framework. We zijn druk bezig met mobile-first design. Dit zorgt ervoor dat we goed nadenken over hoe we onze applicaties ontwerpen. Wanneer we de uitbreiding maken naar de klassieke browsers dan zorgen we dat onze webapplicaties meeschalen naar de grootte van het scherm. Zo kunnen we één applicatie ontwikkelen voor zowel de mobiele telefoon, tablet als desktop.

jobs.title: PHP Developer
jobs.content:
Implement own ideas, work in a vibrant start-up, make decisions and play a key role in contributing to an interesting product!


We are looking for a skilled developer to fill an open position and it may just be you..


The position includes:



  • further developing as well as refactoring our platform

  • contributing to the development of an interesting and diverse system (PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, Linux, Apache, AWS...)

  • taking ownership of back and front ends

  • applying own creativity and experience

  • working on conceptualization and implementation focusing on stability, security, maintenance and performance

  • introducing new technologies and logic

jobs.title: Software Engineer Java
jobs.content:
Topicus heeft altijd plek voor Java ontwikkelaars met originele ideeën en veel eigen initiatief. Je werkt aan en denkt mee over innovatieve oplossingen voor uitdagende, complexe ICT-vraagstukken in Deventer, Enschede, Zwolle of Nijmegen.


Wat ga je doen?


Als Software Engineer ben je een actief lid van een projectteam. Een team bestaat uit een gezonde mix van junior, medior en senior collega’s. Jouw eigen ideeën en kennis van techniek krijgen alle kans om in de praktijk te worden toegepast.


Bij Topicus is software ontwikkelen namelijk meer dan programmeren alleen. Dankzij onze op Agile en SCRUM gebaseerde projectaanpak zijn we in staat snel en doelgericht applicaties te realiseren. We zijn druk bezig met de transitie van de (nu al) traditionele webapplicaties naar een multidevice wereld waar onze gebruikers naast webbrowsers steeds meer gebruik gaan maken van tablets en mobiele telefoons om de informatie te vergaren. Al deze devices moeten uiteraard naadloos op elkaar aansluiten en hiervoor worden diverse technologieën gebruikt, bijvoorbeeld Java 7, Apache Wicket, JAX-RS, Hibernate, CDI en JQuery voor de ontsluiting via het web. Daarnaast worden de native apps ontwikkeld in onder andere iOS en Android waarbij er een geavanceerde integratie met onze web applicaties is. Aan welke projecten je gaat werken, dat hangt vooral van jou af. Als jij je voorkeuren en affiniteit aangeeft, vinden wij daar een passend project bij.

Wij hebben Java teams in zowel Deventer (Zorg & Onderwijs) als Enschede (Onderwijs & Overheid) als Zwolle (Finance) en zijn op zoek naar zowel ervaren als onervaren Java collega's.

jobs.title: Senior Software Development Engineer
jobs.content:
Amazon Lab126 is an inventive research and development company that designs and engineers high-profile consumer electronics. Lab126 began in 2004 as a subsidiary of Amazon.com, Inc., originally creating the best-selling Kindle family of products. Since then, we have produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets, Fire TV and Amazon Echo.



What will you help us create?



The Role:

As a Sr. Software Development Engineer - Cloud, you will engage with an experienced cross-disciplinary staff to conceive, design, and bring to market innovative consumer electronics products. You will work closely with an internal interdisciplinary team and outside partners to drive key aspects of product definition, execution, and test. You must be responsive, flexible, and able to succeed within an open collaborative peer environment.



The ideal candidate has current and extensive experience developing and building distributed systems and applications. The ideal candidate:



• Has in-depth expertise working with distributed systems and understands how they are deployed.

• Enjoys working side by side with partners, colleagues and teams on tough problems

• Is highly effective and thrives in a dynamic environment with multiple, changing priorities

• Knows what is important when shipping products to customers and has been through the process from start to finish

• Is comfortable with proactive outward communication and technical leadership and never shies away from a challenge

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field

• 7+ years of experience doing hands-on software development

• 7+ years of coding skills in JAVA

• 4+ years of current experience working with Distributed systems or applications.

• 3+ years of experience in REST architecture for web services

• 3+ years of Data analysis and debugging skills

 



• Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field

• Experience with working on AWS services(S3, DynamoDB, EC2).

• Strong communication and interpersonal skills

• Experience defining system architectures and exploring technical feasibility tradeoffs

• Proficiency in the tools of the trade, including a variety of modern programming languages (Java, C/C++, Python) and open-source technologies (Linux, Android, OpenGL, Eclipse)



Lab126 is part of the Amazon.com, Inc. group of companies and is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer - Minority / Female / Disability / Veteran / Gender Identity / Sexual Orientation.

jobs.title: Industrial Engineer
jobs.content: Lake Zurich, IL

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.content:
Our engineering teams architect, develop and test our social network. As a Senior Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for building awesome frontends, assuring their quality and running them in a production environment in an interdisciplinary team of different specialists.


As a Senior Frontend Developer at InterNations, you will:



  • implement and architect web applications in HTML, CSS and JavaScript in a Scrum team

  • identify and communicate front-end best practices

  • build efficient and reusable front-end systems and abstractions

  • test your code with automated tests

  • take part in expanding, documenting and implementing our UX pattern library

  • work with Product Management on the feasibility of upcoming changes


You meet the following requirements:



  • expert-level knowledge of JavaScript: you understand prototypal inheritance, scoping, and closures

  • familiarity beyond ES5 (e.g. ES6, TypeScript, CoffeeScript) 

  • you care about consistency of design and dislike having ten different buttons on a single page

  • you like fast web applications and know how to optimize them

  • experience in JavaScript frameworks, especially React and Backbone is a plus but deep JavaScript knowledge is way more important

  • you want to learn new things: technology, practices, user interactions

  • you have an interest in coordinating cross-team efforts and initiatives

  • a minimum of 2 years of relevant experience as a frontend developer

  • familiarity with automated testing, be it unit-, functional- and/or acceptance testing


We offer:



  • top notch MacBook, 27” display, keyboard layout of choice

  • a fast-growing, dynamic company with international scope

  • a friendly work atmosphere and the space you need to pursue your own ideas

  • weekly team breakfasts, fresh fruit & regular team events

  • a central location in a wonderful cosmopolitan city with beautiful natural surroundings

  • support with visa and work permit application

  • we only need to support IE 10+


Sound interesting?


Then start the conversation by sending in your application today (CV, cover letter, start date, salary expectation) c/o Lars Strojny to:jobs@internations.org

Please include in your cover letter a list of projects you contributed to and are proud of. We also like to hear about what kind of work environment you aspire for and what technologies you find interesting right now.

jobs.title: Software Developer  Python
jobs.content:
Sainsbury’s, one of the UK’s largest retailers is investing heavily in digital innovation - its aim being to build a centre of excellence where digital output is crafted using industry leading best practice frameworks and methodologies to produce the world class apps and services. The team is growing rapidly and looking for talented colleagues to help deliver ambitious and market leading services that live up to Sainsbury’s industry leading reputation.


We are looking for a Python Developer to help build great apps and services in the Sainsbury’s Digital Team. You will work closely with other Software Developers and Designers across multiple platforms and technologies to create a beautiful application ecosystem that is consistent, highly usable, reliable and performant.

jobs.title: Software Developer- Node.js
jobs.content:
Sainsbury’s, one of the UK’s largest retailers is investing heavily in digital innovation - its aim being to build a centre of excellence where digital output is crafted using industry leading best practice frameworks and methodologies to produce the world class apps and services. The team is growing rapidly and looking for talented colleagues to help deliver ambitious and market leading services that live up to Sainsbury’s industry leading reputation.


We are looking for a Node.js Developer to help build great apps and services in the Sainsbury’s Digital Team. You will work closely with other Software Developers and Designers across multiple platforms and technologies to create a beautiful application ecosystem that is consistent, highly usable, reliable and performant.

jobs.title: Software Architect to create enterprise software with consumer scale!
jobs.content:
Step away from the details and see the big picture as an architect supporting Concur’s Travel, Expense, and Invoice products. Be part of a small group that provides high level design and thought leadership to our flagship offerings. Set the direction of the code and help change how we do business by future-proofing our products and ensuring we remain technically cutting-edge. In your first 12 months you will:



  • Use computer programming languages, software tools, and software development environments to code, modify, and prototype programs.

  • Gain complex product functionality and architecture knowledge.

  • Analyze internal development process and make recommendations for changes.

  • Produce Design Documents for assigned application features/enhancements.

  • Provide feedback on functionality requests regarding feasibility and complexity.

  • Investigate assigned product issues, analyze layers of code for origin of bugs, and recommend solutions to cross-functional teams (Development\Product Marketing).

jobs.title: Awesome Python developer; ready to go make life changing stuff?
jobs.content:
Your mission


Develop cool and innovative tools that make life easier, exciting and fun for Drupal, Joomla!, Wordpress, and Magento developers. Or would you rather integrate existing tools into our homebuild Service panel? Will your new tool end up in the list of awesomeware like the famous Magento Monitor, Sucuri & NeoPI security scan, One-click installers, and automagic backup/version monitoring/upgrade tool? Are you ready to work with new technology, and translate your vision into reality? Sounds good, right?

jobs.title: Salesforce Developer
jobs.content:
About MediDate



At MediDate, our mission is to build the lifestyle surgery experience of the future. We are Europe’s leading platform for premium lifestyle surgery treatments. We offer access to high quality eye, body and teeth treatments from the best doctors at attractive prices and guide our patients along the way. MediDate launched in early 2015 and is growing quickly. We are supported by some of the most prestigious investors in Europe.



Become a part of our team and help us shape the global future of lifestyle surgery!


For our Berlin team, we are currently looking for a Salesforce Developer (m/w).


Responsibilities



  • Setting up Custom Objects, Validation Rules, User Profiles, Record Types, Page Layouts

  • Developing custom controllers and VisualForce pages

  • Configuring workflow processes and email triggers against records

  • Developing REST APIs for Salesforce integration with external apps

  • Develop, Test and Deploy Business solutions on SalesForce.com platform

  • Manage third-party services for Sales, Customer Support (CTI) and Marketing


Skills and experiences



  • Experience with APEX and Visualforce

  • Experience with SQL Databases and Syncing data between Salesforce and other database

  • Production and sandbox design and development experience

  • Experience in configuring and supporting other Salesforce.com AppExchange applications

  • Communicate with project managers from different departments

  • Create technical documentations about your projects


We offer



  • International work and life experience in the center of Berlin

  • A collegial, open-minded team with great members and a continuous exchange that will support you in your professional development

  • Challenging and diverse work with a lot of responsibility

  • Start-Up atmosphere and spirit

  • A highly attractive work place with a motivating and dynamic environment and flat hierarchies

  • German language courses, discount on gym membership, team events, free drinks and more


Become a part of our success story! Please send us your application to Jasna Kranar via jobs@medidate.de .

jobs.title: Java technologist sought to create exciting cloud-based software!
jobs.content:
Integral to this role is using JVM technologies to break old paradigms. You will be creating web services that consume data from a massive back end containing complex logic that consistently helps 30,000 businesses in over 100 different countries manage their Employee Spend. If you have strong Java, are technically savvy across a myriad of technologies with a relentless determination to solve difficult problems, Concur would love to hear from you. In the first 12 months, you will: 



  • Design communication interfaces and system integrations using web services and other protocols between enterprise applications using SOA best practices.

  • Create intelligent and intuitive software which helps us provide an even better extended service to our clients, collaborating with our Data Science team in the US if required.

  • Manage and maintain development and test application stacks from OS to web server to web page. 

  • Participate in code reviews and pair programming to validate effectiveness and quality of code

  • Troubleshoot, modify, and maintain existing code within enterprise applications and databases

jobs.title: Software that defines future tech: EUV Source Software Designer
jobs.content:
Introduction


Do you feel excited creating robust software facilities? Enabling groundbreaking science to be implemented and translated into practical software? And do you have several years of software development experience in a high tech environment? This might be the job for you!


Job Mission & Description


Within ASML the next generation of lithography machines is being developed in the EUV (Extreme Ultra Violet) program. In the program a new light source (the "Source") is introduced which creates EUV light. 


We are looking for a Software Engineer in our EUV Source Facilities department. Here, we provide and deploy industrial strength software facilities that form the software backbone of a mature Source product line. These facilities include support for e.g. data management, interface construction, system diagnosis, product variability management, system control, etc. These facilities are used throughout the EUV Source software.



You will work in a team reporting to your team lead. This team uses Scrum/Kanban during development. You will have close collaboration with your architect and peers. To come to the right solutions, you are also required to discuss requirements with our stakeholders. For this you need to be pro-active and be able to find your way in the organization. In addition to creating new functionalities, a large part of our work consists of updating and troubleshooting existing (legacy) software.

We are proud of our team. We hire talented, motivated people and give them responsibility and the autonomy to innovate. We like people with a ‘can-do’ attitude and we want people who are inquisitive, hungry and eager to grow with us.

Summary of main responsibilities


- Develop and maintain software using C/C++/Python


- Perform Software Impact Analysis for proposed changes


- Write / update required documentation (design, test, ...)


- Implement and test accepted changes

jobs.title: Senior Java Engineer for DevOps culture embracing end-to-end service ownership!
jobs.content:
Use your full stack Java experience to deliver critical features to over 30 million SaaS users and help us bring consumer scale to complex business software as our user-base continues to grow rapidly.. From inception to deployment, incorporate cutting-edge architecture and technologies to deliver world-leading micro services. Collaborate and communicate with highly skilled teams around the globe to deliver exceptional customer satisfaction for Concur’s innovative Expense products. In your first 12 months you will:



  • Help us create an event driven service that dynamically updates enterprise configuration at scale.

  • Add features/enhancements to current Expense Management services within an agile environment.

  • Gain product & domain knowledge while collaborating to tackle critical customer facing bugs.

  • Be comfortable working across the technology stack from UI to persistence layer.

  • Demonstrate your knowledge of quality engineering practices and principles

jobs.title: Sr. Mobile iOS and/or Android Developer
jobs.content:
Your role


We are looking forward to welcome an experienced, full-time (40h) mobile developer iOS/Android. You are part of a professional development team. You develop mobile applications within an Agile Scrum-environment. You are (partially) responsible for the look-and-feel and interaction of perfectly functional applications. You make the best judgments on performance and technical implementation of the interaction interface related to budget and costs.

jobs.title: System Engineer
jobs.content:
We are a small company based in Tokyo that provides online translation services. Currently, our development team is looking for a junior to mid-level candidate who possesses both software development and system administration experience. The engineer would be responsible for the following:



  • Developing the databases and processes underlying our translation software

  • Developing QA software (primarily system observation tools)

  • Maintaining server hardware/software

  • Contributing to research and data mining for enhancement of system AI


Japanese resumes are given priority, so if you have one or can make one, please do so!

jobs.title: iOS Developer - Swift
jobs.content:
As an iOS developer at Starling here you will create the most compelling mobile banking experience in the UK. You will collaborate with designers and platform experts to build slick and secure user interfaces using our core platform API and cutting edge security approaches. 


You will write Swift code and use CI / CD techniques for fast and frequent delivery of betas.

jobs.title: JavaScript application developer
jobs.content:
We’re recruiting a professional and enthusiastic JavaScript developer to join our team to work collaboratively with other engineers in the development and maintenance of a well-established software product providing Contact Centre functionality.


The primary  focus is building and enhancing instinctive, modern user interfaces taking advantage of the latest UI techniques.

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.content:
Who we are


Geckoboard is a successful and growing 33-person B2B SaaS startup based in East London. Our elegant, real-time dashboards solve a difficult but valuable problem for thousands of paying subscribers, by taking the complexity out of connecting to their data and making that data simple for anyone to interpret at a glance. As a result, our customers unlock data they didn't know they had, connect people and join up projects, and make better decisions faster.


We have a lot of exciting work ahead and are looking for curious and creative problem solvers to help develop our product and take it to even more customers. You'll be joining a friendly team with great people (see "Who you are") in an environment with empowered developers, flexible working conditions, and a focus on skill development (see "Life at Geckoboard").


Who you are


We are looking for a full-time front-end engineer with experience building single page applications. You'll be passionate about working as part of a team, and learning from others through pair programming and peer review. You'll be comfortable liaising with our product designer on design and implementation. You’ll relish the opportunity to continually improve an existing product through refactoring and the removal/addition of features.


More than anything, we value candidates who are excited about picking up new skills and sharing what they’ve learned with the rest of the team - for example, none of us knew Go or React.js a short time ago, but now both are key parts of our stack. We love people with a keen attention to detail and the willingness to apply it in shaping all aspects of our product.

jobs.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
jobs.content:
• Design and implement infrastructure for our financial services

  • Translate scalability, security and reliability requirements into infrastructure

  • Work closely with engineering teams to ensure that best practices are shared and applications are built according to operational standards and guidelines

  • Develop and enforce security policies and mentor the entire team on security best practices

  • Keep our platform up and running 24/7 and participate in incident response

  • Follow agile process, stick to commitments and respect definition of agreed principles

jobs.title: Software Tester
jobs.content:
Als Test Engineer bij Centric draag je bij aan het verbeteren van de kwaliteit van de software en verschillende applicaties. In deze veelzijdige en uitdagende functie bent je een schakel tussen de opdrachtgever en de ontwikkelaars.
Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het maken, onderhouden en uitvoeren van de functionele testen. Tevens stel je testscripts op voor specifieke aanpassingen in de applicatie en voer je deze testscripts uit. Je werkt in één van de Scrum teams, dus je hebt direct contact met de ontwikkelaars en ontwerpers.
Binnen het Scrum team wordt van de tester een flexibele en interactieve rol verwacht waarbij je ook het voortraject bent betrokken. Voor jou houdt het testen niet op bij het vinden van een fout, je wilt ook analyseren wat het probleem veroorzaakt heeft. Ook het inrichten en onderhouden van de testomgevingen behoort tot je takenpakket.

Jouw Business Unit
Je gaat werken voor de Business Unit Belastingen. Het is onderdeel van Centric Netherlands B.V. met vestigingen in Gouda en Son. Deze unit ontwikkelt en implementeert geavanceerde software voor gemeenten en waterschappen op het gebied van heffen, innen, taxeren en waarderen in het kader van de lokale belastingheffing. Wij onderscheiden ons door kennis van lokale belastingen en WOZ en van de recentste innovaties in de IT. Onze totaaloplossingen bestaan uit een combinatie van IT oplossingen, consultancy, IT services, system integration en training.

De Business Unit Belastingen rekent gemeenten, waterschappen en samenwerkingen van gemeenten en waterschappen tot haar opdrachtgevers. Wij zijn in staat om grootschalige projecten te realiseren en continuïteit te garanderen, waarbij partnership voorop staat.

jobs.title: Software Engineer Python - Join us
jobs.content:
Are you a thought leader and expert in your technology stack? Can you solve any task thrown at you, irrespective of complexity or scale? Do you mentor those in your team and push the boundaries of perfection? Do you know which corners can and can't be cut? Delivering A-class products that scale to millions of users,  applying new industry trends and challenging your peers are all part of the daily gig.


Our Software Engineers conceive, design and deliver the most complex products within their stream. They have an intimate knowledge of the business domain and always put our user's experience first.


Your Responsibilities?



  • Hit the ground running - Gather up-to-date and in-depth understanding of the dubizzle code base and technologies stack within weeks;

  • Lead planning sessions around new product features, deliver detailed roll-out/roll-back strategies for releases.

  • Research and apply industry trends as part of your daily work;

  • Create unit tests in accordance with our established standards to cover assigned work;

  • Write and maintain exemplary code following dubizzle’s programming practices;

  • Actively contribute in post-release maintenance issues;

  • Develop elegant solutions for complex problems;

  • Pioneer reliability and efficiency of our current code base, platforms and/or core systems;

  • Impact on the direction and scope of dubizzle’s technical vision within your stream;

  • Define the architecture of your product steam;

  • Gain a detailed understanding of the complete architecture of our product and the position of your product stream in it;

  • Work in a mentoring capacity within a peer-programming environment and provide guidance on tasks, irrespective of complexity or scale;

  • Code review all major pull requests, defining programming standards and providing constructive feedback.

  • Provide and share a broad knowledge of technologies and architectures and function as a mentor within the scope of your product stream (and outside of it when required);

  • Capacity to push back requirements when incomplete;

  • Handle the entire software development life cycle, end to end

jobs.title: Virtualisatie Specialist
jobs.content: Je zoekt als Virtualisatie Specialist een uitdagende functie waarin je jouw kennis van en ervaring op het gebied van virtualisatie toepast bij het beheren, ondersteunen en de realisatie van complexe IT-omgevingen. Jouw expertise op het gebied van VMWare, Microsoft Hyper-V of Citrix deel je graag met collega’s om samen te komen tot innovatieve oplossingen die er toe doen. Je bent nieuwsgierig naar de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van virtualisatie en cloud computing en blijft up-to-date door het volgen van seminars, trainingen en opleidingen. Je werkt graag binnen een informele omgeving waar jij je kunt blijven ontwikkelen en waar jij zelf de richting van jouw carrière bepaalt.

jobs.title: SharePoint Developer
jobs.content:
Gaat je voorkeur uit naar een financieel zeer gezonde, informele en mensgerichte werkgever die je de vrijheid geeft, je stimuleert én veel mogelijkheden geeft voor trainingen en opleidingen (je certificaten behalen)? Wil je daarnaast je leercurve vergroten door met veel verschillende opdrachtgevers en de nieuwste technologieën te werken?
Kom dan eens langs voor een kennismaking op onze vestiging in Assen!

Vanwege het continue aanbod van uitdagende projecten zoekt Centric naar versterking van haar enthousiaste SharePoint team. Centric is 5x Microsoft Gold Partner en organiseert jaarlijks met Microsoft het 'Centric TechEvent' waar ruim 400 Microsoft collega's van Centric samenkomen om kennis te delen en op te doen.

Voor meer informatie/ ervaringen van Centric collega's kan je kijken op:www.centric.eu/sharepoint

Als SharePoint-developer zorg jij voor brede toepassingsmogelijkheden van het SharePoint platform zoals bijvoorbeeld Document Management Systemen, Procesondersteuning en Web Content Management (WCM). Binnen afwisselende projecten ben jij verantwoordelijk voor de architectuur, het ontwerp en de technische ontwikkeling van oplossingen voor onze klanten. Hierbij heb je niet alleen kennis van de SharePoint functionaliteiten maar ook van het Microsoft .NET ontwikkelplatform, omdat voor onze oplossingen vaak kennis binnen beide vakgebieden benodigd zijn.
Je analyseert, brengt knelpunten in kaart en presenteert de quick wins en duurzame verbeteringen die je hebt gerealiseerd. Ook neem je actief deel aan ons Microsoft-expertisecentrum. Blijven groeien vind je namelijk belangrijk, inhoudelijk maar ook als persoon. Werken doe je graag in teamverband, waar je te maken hebt met onder andere architecten, ontwerpers en informatieanalisten.

jobs.title: Senior Java Engineer - Be instrumental in advancing science & health
jobs.content:
Working within Elsevier’s key Storage & Discovery teams, this is a new position within a recently established team and will play a key role in complex research, design, and software development assignments and provides direct input to project plans, schedules, and methodology in the development of cross-functional software products. You will perform software design — typically across multiple systems; mentor more-junior members of the team; and talks to users/customers and translates their requests into solutions. This is an excellent opportunity to join a new, greenfield team with a competitive salary and benefits along with significant career progression opportunities.


Key Responsibilities



  • Work with Business analyst and business partners to understand system requirements and produce a high quality product to worldwide customers on a predictable timeline.

  • Taking a leading role in the development of our API strategy, helping to deliver a range of services that are used both by internal development teams, external third parties and customers

  • Leading design and code reviews and be accountable for the actions taken from these sessions, seeing them through to implementation as agreed

  • Involve in the various agile activities, including leading planning and estimating sessions and reporting progress to their assigned project lead and/or project manager

  • Review and understand a complex cloud deployment and work with application architects to optimize it for maximum performance and cost effectiveness.

jobs.title: Software Developer .NET
jobs.content:
Als Software Developer .NET krijg je te maken met veel verschillende opdrachten en technieken. Van het ontwikkelen van websites met het MVC-framework en/of de modernste Javascript Library’s tot het bouwen van cloudoplossingen met Azure. Maar denk ook aan projecten op het gebied van Continuous Integration en Continuous Delivery. En de opdrachtgevers? Ook die zijn heel verschillend. De ene maand werk je aan een state-of-the-art webapplicatie voor een boekingssite, de maand erop aan een portal voor een zorgverzekeraar. Dat houdt het werk leuk, interessant en leerzaam. Kortom, als je graag werkt aan complexe technische opdrachten binnen het brede spectrum van .NET, dan zit je goed bij Centric.
 
Omdat jouw kennis en ervaring het succes van Centric bepalen, vinden we het verder belangrijk dat je als vakman op de hoogte blijft van de laatste ontwikkelingen. Daarom neem je actief deel aan kennisbijeenkomsten, seminars en congressen, ook via ons groei- en kennisdelingsplatform.


Bij Centric word je persoonlijk begeleid. In je dagelijkse werkzaamheden, maar ook op het gebied van bijvoorbeeld loopbaanontwikkeling. Daarnaast bieden jou via het Craft-programma veel opleidings- en trainingsmogelijkheden. Hierbij gaan wij verder dan de standaard Microsoft-certificeringen. Zo helpen we je ook slagen voor specialistische trainingen als Advanced Javascript, Code Quality, Release en Build Management en securitytrainingen die worden gegeven door onze ethical hacker. Bovendien krijg je via Craft toegang tot diverse events en bijeenkomsten, zoals het jaarlijks terugkerende Microsoft Techevent dat wij organiseren.

Ga je bij Centric aan de slag, dan bieden wij jou:



  • Uitgebreide trainings- en opleidingsmogelijkheden

  • Persoonlijke inzetbonus én winstuitkering

  • Naast technisch interessante ook vele informele bijeenkomsten

  • Mobiliteitsbudget te gebruiken voor een leaseauto of eigen vervoer

  • Collectiviteitskorting op diverse zorgverzekeringen

  • Goede pensioenvoorzieningen en 26 vakantiedagen

jobs.title: ALGORITHM DEVELOPER
jobs.content:
The role


We’re looking for an expert in designing and coding algorithms, with a strong interest in applying these within an ecommerce setting. You’ll be fueling rapid business growth in an industry leader by producing new analytic insights and developing tools to assist with price optimization, forecasting, recommender engines, etc.   As you work closely with colleagues from a broad spectrum of business units, both technical and non-technical, you will develop a deep expertise not only technically but also in marketing, finance and product development, growing a comprehensive understanding of ecommerce in general and the vacation rentals industry in particular.


The position will be based in the Amsterdam office, with some travel required to the Eindhoven office.


Tasks and responsibilities



  • Develop a strong understanding of our internal data, particularly within the SQL Server data warehouse and developing big data systems.   Be able to pull the data and process it in preparation for analysis using tools such as (variants of) SQL, python, R, etc.

  • Design and implement basic and advanced algorithms for use in descriptive and proscriptive analysis (pricing, forecasting, strategic decisions, online recommendations, etc), working closely with both technology and business units

jobs.title: Python Developer - Delivery Hero Holding
jobs.content:
Delivery Hero is building the next generation global online food-ordering platform. Our awesome international team already operates in 33 countries worldwide to ensure hungry customers get the fastest way to their favorite takeaway food. The company has grown from its inception in 2011 to become one of the World largest food-ordering networks. This is an exciting time for Delivery Hero with a huge and rapid amount of growth in countries, market size and opportunities. Delivery Hero Holding is looking for a Python Developer (m/f) to join us as soon as possible on our mission. Our ideal candidate will be enthusiastic, innovative and good at getting things done. You can play an active role in our future - an exciting job and a workplace in the heart of Berlin is waiting for you.


The Delivery Hero Family currently delivers around 1 million meals a day. We’d like to deliver 5 million a day, and then 50 million. It’s a big job, and we’re looking for open, engaged and passionate Python developers to join our team.



Your mission:



  • Build a global online ordering platform

  • Design, implement, integrate and maintain new services and APIs

  • Scale and improve existing backend services

  • Grow and expand your expertise and Delivery Hero’s technology stack

jobs.title: Frontend Developer - shape the future of the real estate market!
jobs.content:
Join our team at McMakler – the future of the real estate market! We are looking for frontend developers who would like to further their knowledge about cutting-edge technologies and be involved in the creation of our product. Our multidimensional product will soon rely heavily on a Single Page Application (SPA) powered by AngularJS, various cutting-edge services and front-end technologies. We widely use Git in development, and Scrum + Kanban to manage our projects. We are currently working on integrating test driven development principles to all layers of our landscape.


As McMakler we offer:



  • You will become part of a highly motivated and international team of development, user experience, marketing and operations experts

  • You gain the unique opportunity to experience and shape the setup of a recently founded company

  • You will work with the latest technologies and have influence over technological decisions

  • You can grow with a high degree of freedom

  •  You will work at a modern office in the heart of Berlin

  • Free choice of equipment and operating system

  • Experience and shape a communicative, creative and stimulating working environment

  • Fun team events! (Laser tag, go karting, drinks, food and more)

  • Free cold and warm drinks


As a front-end developer, you will:



  • Play an active role in developing complex and performant Single Page Application(s)

  •  Demonstrate expertise in JavaScript, HTML, CSS and/or other front-end technologies, as well as web frameworks and front-end or web application development 

  • Implement new features in a highly collaborative work environment alongside Product, Design and API developers, as well as other front-end engineers

  • Contribute to a future-ready, high quality and performant code base

  • Share technical solutions, product ideas and front-end best-practices through code review and technical discussions

  • Demonstrate initiative, self-motivation, creative problem-solving and effective interpersonal/communication skills that support the process of building a collaborative team

  • Attention to detail and identify potential performance weak spots

  • Demonstrate flexibility and strong teamwork skills


Kudos for:



  • Experience with AngularJS (1.5.x - 2.x) is preferred

  • Experience with React.js, Node.js, TypeScript , ES6 is a plus

  • Working knowledge of Wordpress, Twig, Bootstrap and Material Design is optional

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.content:
We don`t have jobs. We have a mission!


Since its establishment in 2002, Spreadshirt has become one of Germany's most successful start-up companies, Europe's leading social e-commerce platform and the third biggest print-on-demand company in the USA. We cater to the needs of over half a million sales partners as well as millions of customers in 20 countries and 12 languages. With immediate effect, we are looking for reinforcement to lead our Create-Your-Own/Check-Out Teams as a...


(Senior) Front End Developer (m/f)


You will encounter exciting challenges in your position as a Front End Developer in Spreadshirt's Software Development Department. Spreadshirt's platform is an extraordinary and diverse system that continually poses varied challenges in all areas of software development. Some of the most aspiring projects are:



  • Turning Spreadshirt's platform into a scalable micro services architecture

  • Furthering Spreadshirt's API

  • Technological modernisation of existing applications


Your Tasks



  • You are part of an agile, cross-functional development team (PO, UX, Front End and Back End, QA) concerned with the T-Shirt Designer and the check out, contributing to their improved functionality and usability

  • You and your team create web applications, including migration strategies to facilitate a smooth and trouble-free supersession of the system in place

jobs.title: Freelancer
jobs.content:
Our goal is to move to a solution that allows us to reboot any MySQL server without downtime and even tolerates server failure. As a “Freelancer for Galera Migration (m/f)” you will be running this project and support our team by migrating to MariaDB Galera.


Project description:



  • For legacy reasons we are still running non virtualized MySQL instances

  • We would like to migrate to MariaDB Galera, which allows us to reboot any MySQL server without downtime

  • All our Servers are located in Berlin (we own the hardware)

  • We use Linux OS (Debian Squeeze, Wheezy, Jessie) and 3TB of Data

  • We run 20 platforms distributed over 65 separate MySQL instances

  • In the review part, the Galera settings and the Server Setup have to be reviewed

  • We plan to run three instances per Galera cluster

  • The migration has to be done while the platform is live w/o any downtime


You will be working with a committed, successful and international engineering team in one of the best tech companies in Berlin. Visual Meta offers an encouraging working environment and healthy snacks. If you are interested in an exciting position within a friendly team, please submit your application in English to the attention of Alexander Schultheiß, including CV, your earliest starting date as well as salary expectations. We are looking forward to receiving your application!

jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer
jobs.content:
We are looking for an highly experienced Java developer that is eager to tackle complex topics.


What we offer


So what’s the team like? What started as a university project has grown organically over the last seven years into a distinctly international crew. We keep things open, agile and communicative, with pair programming widely practiced and encouraged. It is all based on trust – no micromanaging, no distributed teams, no nearshoring, no offshoring – face to face communication is premium. That is why the whole development team is located together in one office in beautiful Berlin!


We are constantly evolving and looking to integrate new technologies in our technology stack. We currently:



  • Version with Git

  • Build with Gradle and Webpack

  • Write Java 8 and ECMAScript 6 code

  • Manage with NPM

  • Test with TestNG, Selenium, Mocha and Karma

  • Automate with Jenkins

  • Utilize React and Redux

  • Organize with Scrum and Kanban


You are free to use the OS and IDE of your choice, the tooling you are comfortable with and setup your workspace the way you like it.


Our engineers are self-organized within their teams, working on components and independent projects together and closely with product managers and UX designers. We value your thoughts and ideas and will give you the freedom to push and implement them.


We get that balancing a family and work can be a challenge, so everyone (family or no family) gets flexible work hours. Work when you work best.


We support personal growth, both in and outside of the company. You will gain – and share – knowledge during recurring learning lunches, jours fixes, pizza sessions and our annual code camp.


How you contribute


We are looking for a Java guru to strengthen our development team in Berlin. You will help to continue to develop and improve our leading cloud-based business process modeling, decision modeling and workflow software.


Specifically you will:



  • Take a major role in the development of complex software components

  • Design and implement new features to our backend

  • Introduce new technologies and concepts by leading major refactoring initiatives

  • Improve existing components

  • Implement automated tests

  • Work closely together with you frontend engineer teammates on API specifications

  • Review the work of your teammates

jobs.title: Support and Pre-Sales Engineer
jobs.content:
Support the Acunetix products and Assist with Pre-Sales



  • Provide 1st line of support for customers and resellers via telephone and the Acunetix Support System.

  • Remotely connect to customers’ installations to troubleshoot their issues.

  • Use various support techniques, including reviewing the product’s log files to gain further knowledge of the problem encountered by the customer.

  • Escalate unresolved support tickets to tier 2 support and follow up to ensure escalated tickets are resolved.

  • Periodically test and report any problems discovered in the Acunetix products.

  • Assist the Acunetix sales team, resellers and distributors with pre-sales technical queries.

  • Prepare and deliver online sales and technical demonstrations of the products.

  • Might be required to attend conferences and meetings abroad.


Produce Technical Content



  • Produce technical write-ups about topics related to the Acunetix products.

  • Research and keep up to date with new web and network security vulnerabilities.

  • Suggest new technical content when needed, such as blog posts and articles.

  • Produce technical videos which would be made available on YouTube.

jobs.title: Senior Low Latency C++ Software Developer - Automated Trading Systems
jobs.content:
Technology is an integral part of our business. In order to address our development needs, we are seeking a Senior Low latency C++ Software Developer - Automated Trading Systems to join our development team.


The successful candidate will be a senior member of the team responsible for developing low latency automated trading systems.



Responsibilities:



  • Design and implement equity derivatives market making systems and low latency algorithmic trading systems including quoters, hedgers and index arbitrage (delta one)

  • Interact with traders and quant strategist to gather system requirements

  • Play an active role in the architecture design and development of next generation of low latency trading platform

  • Provide Tier 3 support

  • Play an active role in team growth and results

jobs.title: Senior Java Front Office Developer
jobs.content:
Eclipse Trading is embarking on a significant transformation of our in-house Equity Derivatives Trading Systems to support its continuing expansion into new markets and trading strategies. The successful candidate will become a core member of the development team responsible for this transformation.



Role:



  • Transform the design and architecture of our suite of Java trading applications for our growing Delta 1 and Options Market Making desks

  • Rearchitect our Reference Data, Parameter Management and Order Management systems to support our growing volumes and expansion into new product lines

  • Design and implement new solutions to manage inventory, tracking error and short selling

  • Work directly with traders to capture requirements and propose solutions

jobs.title: Hadoop Developer  CST Finance, Credit & Risk
jobs.content:
Overview


DBS will be revamping its Finance & Risk Data Store, Reporting infrastructures via the use of open source tools data processing tools such as Hadoop and Spark. As part of this program the bank is looking to recruit experienced Hadoop developers to join the core system technology department to contribute to the in-house build and assembly of its Finance and Risk systems involving capture, processing and analytic of business data. 


This role requires experienced Hadoop developers, ideally (but not required) with knowledge of Finance & Risk processing, analytics and reporting. These roles will be based out of Singapore.


Key Responsibilities



  • Responsible for developing application using Hadoop Tools and related technologies,

  • Responsible for executing software development from conceptual phase to testing phase.

  • Working with vendors and business analyst and End Users within organization.

  • Responsible for mentoring junior developers.

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.content:
We are looking for a JavaScript expert with solid experience in web application programming.


What we offer


So what’s the team like? What started as a university project has grown organically over the last seven years into a distinctly international crew. We keep things open, agile and communicative, with pair programming practiced and encouraged. It is all based on trust – no micromanaging, no distributed teams, no nearshoring, no offshoring – face to face communication is premium. jobs.title: Senior Exchange Connectivity Software Developer
jobs.content:
Technology is an integral part of our business. In order to address our development needs, we are seeking high caliber individuals to join our development team.


The successful candidate will be a Senior member of the team responsible for developing market links for our in-house developed trading systems.



Responsibilities and Duties



  • Develop low latency exchange connectivity software on Linux platform

  • Test code rigorously and participate in code reviews 

  • Give and receive constructive feedback

jobs.title: Software Developer  C++
jobs.content:
Technology is an integral part of our business. In order to address our development needs, we are seeking high caliber individuals to join our development team.


For our teams in Hong Kong and Shanghai, we are currently seeking candidates for the post of Software Developer – C++


The successful candidate will join the team responsible for developing market links for our in-house developed trading systems.

https://eclipsetrading.peoplehr.net/Pages/JobBoard/Opening.aspx?v=3f6b57e9-3f17-479c-a2d1-3bfd0a670f35

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.content:
About Schoox

Schoox offers the most powerful and modern learning and knowledge management system for any organization. At the same time it brings together the best content providers to offer its corporate customers and individual community members the best courses in almost any topic.

Position Description

You will work with our development team as a senior software engineer. Youll have the opportunity and capability to make decisions about important technology and product questions. You'll work with our team of engineers to build a product our users will love. The product rapidly changes and so you will constantly be adapting to feedback (both qualitative and quantitative) to help influence product decisions. You have to be very familiar with php, mysql and javascript. Knowledge or experience in NoSQL databases like MongoDB or Redis as well as Java will be higly appreciated.

Qualified candidates will have to be talented software engineers, possess a deep understanding of system engineering and have a strong comfort level working within an extremely fast-paced start-up environment.

Responsibilities may significantly increase depending on the candidate.

Expectations:

The ideal candidate will have the following qualities:

  • Acquisitive Learner - resourceful in acquiring knowledge, learns without direction
  • Principled - aligns activities and details with larger goals and principlies
  • Disciplined - imposes structure onto work and life
  • Adaptable - adjusts beliefs and actions in response to new information
  • Facilitative - cultivates and activates talents and opportunities

jobs.title: ARCHITECTE FONCTIONNEL ET APPLICATIF
jobs.content:
Au sein du groupe Société Générale, vous rejoindrez le Business Solution Center, qui est un centre de services partagés et est intégré à la Direction des Ressources et de l'Innovation du Groupe Société Générale.
Sa mission : doter les Filières et Pôle du groupe de solutions informatiques performantes et innovantes.
Comme éditeur et fournisseur de solutions, le Business Solution Center accompagne aussi les grands projets Groupe et la transformation de la Filière.

En tant qu'Architecte Fonctionnel et Applicatif vos missions seront de :
* Mettre en uvre la démarche d'architecture/urbanisation des SI du périmètre concerné
* Identifier les besoins d'évolution dans le processus d'urbanisation et faire des propositions aux contributeurs SI concernés
* Accompagner les projets du périmètre géré pour définir les architectures fonctionnelles et applicatives

Vos principales activités sont de :
* Evaluer la pertinence et la cohérence globale des projets par rapport à l'architecture cible et au SI et participer au calage des projets unitaires et des roadmaps.
* Elaborer et spécifier la cartographie fonctionnelle et applicative sur le périmètre du système d'information en charge, dans le respect du cadre de référence
* Proposer les scénarios d'évolution et de simplification selon les contraintes d'organisation, de contexte, de réglementation et d'architecture cible et assurer la pérennité des modèles fonctionnels du métier.
* Contribuer à l'optimisation des processus métiers, des données, des applications et des systèmes associés.
* Capitaliser l'ensemble des connaissances sur le fonctionnel métier et gérer le patrimoine.
* Définir et administrer le fonctionnel SI : référentiels, règles, démarches, normes et standards Métiers SI.

Les spécificités du poste seront précisées lors de l'entretien.

Poste basé à La Défense et ensuite à Val de Fontenay - CDI
A pourvoir dès que possible.

Tous nos postes sont ouverts aux personnes en situation de handicap.

jobs.title: Ingénieur Etudes et Développement Informatique H/F
jobs.content:
Au sein du groupe Société Générale, vous rejoignez la direction des systèmes d'information de Global Banking & investors Solution. Cette dernière a pour responsabilité, au plan mondial, de fournir aux lignes métiers de la banque de financement et aux fonctions support, l'ensemble des moyens informatiques et SI nécessaires à leur fonctionnement, à des conditions compétitives en termes de standards technologiques, de qualité de service et de coûts.


En tant qu'Ingénieur Etudes et Développement Informatique, vos activités principales seront les suivantes :

* Vous vous appropriez les spécifications fonctionnelles détaillées de la maîtrise d'ouvrage
* Vous participez à la traduction en spécifications techniques,
* Vous vous appropriez les règles de fonctionnement de l'environnement de développement
* Vous codez / paramétrez et documentez ce qui est produit,
* Vous effectuez un reporting de votre activité sur le composant produit ou intégré,
* Vous définissez les cas de tests unitaires sur le composant produit,
* Vous vous assurez de la conformité aux spécifications techniques,
* Vous contribuez au support de 2nd niveau (surveillance de la production, analyses et correction, participation aux astreintes liées à la production),
* Vous pouvez également assurer une veille technologique sur des points spécifiques et participer à la proposition de solutions techniques en apportant de l'information,
* Vous pouvez enfin être référent sur une technologie nouvelle.

Les spécificités du poste seront précisées lors de l'entretien.

Poste basé à La Défense et ensuite à Val de Fontenay - CDI
A pourvoir dès que possible.

Tous nos postes sont ouverts aux personnes en situation de handicap.

jobs.title: Full-stack NodeJS / React developer
jobs.content:
We are looking for a full-stack developer that will be part of a team por a new incubated project (codename «Iceberg»)


You'll work developing a GraphQL API and a React/Relay user interface for a application that will help individuals, companies and the government to collaborate on organizing, mining, analyzing and extracting the hidden value from large datasets. 


Think about the next Panama Papers, the next Wikileaks. 


Think Palantir but for the masses. 


Think GitHub for data.

jobs.title: DÉVELOPPEUR FONCTIONNEL
jobs.content:
Vous êtes passionné(e), talentueux (se) et créatif (ve) ? Vous rêvez de rejoindre une équipe à la recherche de l'excellence ? Alors rejoignez les équipes MAC pour nous accompagner à transformer la finance de demain.
MAC est le Département d'analyse et production des métriques de suivi des risques et résultats des activités de marchés au sein de la Banque de Grande Clientèle et Solutions Investisseurs. Notre mission est de co -construire avec nos partenaires (Front Office, Risques et Finance) des services métiers nous permettant d'avoir les meilleures offres pour nos clients internes et externes.
Nos développeurs doivent faire preuve d'enthousiasme et relever des challenges technologiques et fonctionnels pour réussir la transformation digitale de la banque et les perspectives d'évolution business. Pour répondre à cet objectif, notre équipe de développeurs est intégrée dans notre département métier et se situe à proximité immédiate des desks de trading et des risques managers.
Dans ce cadre de migration technologique conjuguée à la nécessité d'évolution/sécurisation de nos processus et outils, nous recherchons un développeur métier FO & RISQ fonctionnel (Commando) capable de relever les challenges techniques et fonctionnels.

jobs.title: Incident Manager banque de détail H/F
jobs.content:
L'objectif du poste est d'assurer principalement le fonctionnement du système d'information en production pour les enseignes banque de détail du groupe.

La mission couvre principalement les grands thèmes suivants :

1- Le traitement des incidents à « chaud »:
- Suivi des incidents et mise à jour de la main courante
- Secrétariat de crise
- Communications sur incidents prioritaires

2 - La communication sur ITIM QUALITE SI
- Diffusion des flash enseignes
- Diffusion du point de fonctionnement
- Préparation du reporting de bord mensuel Qualité SI
- Participer à l'exploitation des données des référentiels pour alimenter les différents comités
- Participer au bilan annuel qualité

3- La capitalisation « à froid » suite aux incidents gérés.

4 L'amélioration continue.
- Mise à jour des référentiels
- Evolution des outils de la TDC
- Mise a jour de la documentation

jobs.title: Expert Infrastructure SI H/F
jobs.content:
Au sein de GSI (Gestion du SI au quotidien) et du pôle CES (Changement Environnement et Services), vous serez intégré à l'équipe est en charge des activités d'homologation technique pour divers projets d'ITIM, en tant qu'architecte technique sur les projets d'homologation technique

Vos missions :
* Apporter aux analyses de performance une dimension d'architecture technique répondant aux enjeux applicatifs des ME
* Définir et concevoir avec les ME les stratégies en fonction des enjeux de l'application
* Animer les ateliers techniques avec les responsables ME et infrastructure
* Encadrer les analyses applicatives, techniques et valider les rapports associés en y ajoutant les préconisations d'architecture
* Participer à l'évolution de normes et procédures

jobs.title: ANALYSTE CONCEPTEUR SOLUTIONS INF  H/F
jobs.content:
Concevoir une solution informatique conforme à l'enjeu métier et garantir l'adéquation des solutions mises en uvre
avec les besoins exprimés.
Vos principales activités sont de :
* Analyser le besoin, et proposer un mode de développement adapté.
* Etablir, avec le Maître d'Ouvrage, les caractéristiques techniques détaillées de l'application en termes de
fonctionnalités, de performance, d'ergonomie, de maintenance et de sauvegarde.

* Participer aux tests et valider la conformité aux spécifications.

Les spécificités du poste seront précisées lors de l'entretien.

jobs.title: ANALYSTE SOLUTION SI - MÉTIER  H/F
jobs.content:
Intégré à l'équipe mixte Maîtrise d'Ouvrage SI (Business Analyst) et Concepteur Technique/Réalisateurs, les principales missions et responsabilités du poste sont :
- Recueillir et analyser les besoins bancaires, être force de proposition sur ces besoins et contribuer à leur donner la maturité nécessaire afin d'être pris en charge par la DSI
- Estimer les charges et les délais des évolutions de son périmètre, en y intégrant les activités sous -traitées à d'autres entités en fonction des enjeux et des priorités des métiers
- Formaliser les spécifications fonctionnelles générales et détaillées relatives à ces besoins dans le respect des règles d'urbanisme,
- Modéliser les données, en assurant la cohérence des évolutions avec le modèle de données Pilotage et le Langage Commun
- Valider les scénarios de tests élaborés par l'équipe de qualification
- Assurer le suivi fonctionnel et technique des traitements d'exploitation
- Procéder aux analyses d'impact fonctionnel sur le périmètre lors des études de faisabilité ou des cadrages,
- Valider fonctionnellement les évolutions mises en oeuvre lors de leur 1er déroulement en production afin de garantir notamment la qualité des données restituées
- Former tout nouvel arrivant dans l'équipe sur les grandes fonctionnalités du périmètre et le modèle de données,
- Contribuer au reporting et à la communication dans et en dehors de l'entité

jobs.title: CHEF DE PROJET IT  BOURSORAMA H/F
jobs.content:
BOURSORAMA recherche pour l'équipe PILOTAGE au sein de sa DSI, un Chef de Projet. Vous prendrez en charge les missions suivantes:

- Définir et assurer la gouvernance du projet : pilotage des comités et instances de suivi, animation et coordination de l'équipe projet, organisation du travail en interne comme avec les partenaires externes
- Garantir le respect des budgets, des planning et des normes et procédures en vigueur.

La Société Générale est un bel endroit pour vivre la transformation numérique du Monde. Nous sommes convaincus que la Technologie est au cur de cette transformation

ITEC est la Direction Informatique de la Banque de Grande Clientèle et Solutions Investisseurs. Notre mission est de co-construire avec nos partenaires métiers des solutions technologiques nous permettant d'avoir les meilleurs services pour nos clients. Notre ambition est de transformer la finance de marché. Nos artisans développeurs doivent faire preuve d'enthousiasme et relever des challenges technologiques pour réussir la transformation digitale de la Banque.

Vous êtes passionné par votre métier, talentueux, créatif et vous avez une expertise technologique ou méthodologique très pointue ? Vous trouverez chez ITEC (la Direction Informatique de la Banque de Grande Clientèle et Solutions Investisseurs) et nos Features Teams de quoi combler vos attentes ! Si votre ambition est d'innover, nous avons des challenges à votre mesure !

La conception de code de qualité n'a plus de secret pour vous ? Les pratiques visant à garantir fiabilité et maintenabilité du logiciel telles que TDD, BDD, pair programming, revue de code et tests automatisés sont au cur de vos développements et sont des sujets qui vous passionnent ?

Vous aimez choisir la bonne technologie pour le bon problème, Back-end comme Front-end ?

Continous Delivery, Infrastructure As Code, Squads, Chapters, User centric design, Product Owners, Performance Profiling, Scrum, Lean UX, Kanban, CI, Feature toggling, AB Testing, DevOps, GIT, DDD, Cucumber, Gatling, Elastic search, Kibana, Sonar ne sont pas que des buzzwords pour vous ?

En tant que software craftsman / craftswoman, vous n'aurez alors aucun mal à compléter un KATA ou venir coder en live avec nous pour découvrir ce que nous avons à vous offrir !

jobs.title: Ingénieur Etudes et Développement Informatique débutant H/F
jobs.content:
Au sein du groupe Société Générale, vous rejoignez la direction des systèmes d'information de Global Banking & investors Solution. Cette dernière a pour responsabilité, au plan mondial, de fournir aux lignes métiers de la banque de financement et aux fonctions support, l'ensemble des moyens informatiques et SI nécessaires à leur fonctionnement, à des conditions compétitives en termes de standards technologiques, de qualité de service et de coûts.

En tant qu'Ingénieur Etudes et Développement Informatique vos missions sont les suivantes :

* S'approprier les spécifications fonctionnelles détaillées de la maîtrise d'ouvrage,
* S'approprier les règles de fonctionnement de l'environnement de développement,
* Coder / paramétrer et documenter ce qui est produit,
* Garantir l'intégration des plateformes dans le SI dans le respect des procédures,
* Respecter les normes et procédures en vigueur (architecture, sécurité, qualité, documentation),
* Effectuer un reporting de votre activité sur le composant produit ou intégré,
* Définir les cas de tests unitaires sur le composant produit,
* Contribuer au support de 2nd niveau (surveillance de la production, analyses et correction, participation aux astreintes liées à la production),
* Assurer une veille technologique et participer à la proposition de solutions techniques en apportant de l'information,

Les spécificités du poste seront précisées lors de l'entretien.

Poste basé à La Défense - CDI
A pourvoir dès que possible.

Tous nos postes sont ouverts aux personnes en situation de handicap.

jobs.title: Front End Javascript Engineer
jobs.content:
About the role


Our Desktop cloud based client, has proven to be the best product in the market. We’re revising our web services and expanding our desktop experience into the browser world with even better functionality than our clients could imagine, and our competitors could dream of! 


To bring a modern web experience into the legal world, we’re building our front end in Angular and our team needs an additional member at mid/senior level as we ramp up for version 1. You’ll be working alongside some of the most talented front end developers with a product aligned mindset. 


We have a mix of .NET and Node.js back-ends, Javascript Web apps and mobile (native on both iOS and Android) so there’s always something new to learn.

jobs.title: Sr. Director, Mobile Architecture
jobs.content:
Comcast brings together the best in media and technology. We drive innovation to create the world's best entertainment and online experiences. As a Fortune 50 leader, we set the pace in a variety of innovative and fascinating businesses and create career opportunities across a wide range of locations and disciplines. We are at the forefront of change and move at an amazing pace, thanks to our remarkable people, who bring cutting-edge products and services to life for millions of customers every day. If you share in our passion for teamwork, our vision to revolutionize industries and our goal to lead the future in media and technology, we want you to fast-forward your career at Comcast.






Job Summary:
Responsible for producing technology solutions that satisfy business and
product needs both now and for the future. Focuses on technology
strategies for the development of future and current products. Acts as
the interface to third party vendors from a business and engineering
perspective with respect to requirements generation for meeting company
goals and with respect to licensable technology. Provides leadership and
direction for diverse and complex functions. Contributes to the
development of the organization's business strategy. Interprets business
strategy and develops organizational objectives to align with this
strategy. Typically manages multiple teams of professionals.

Core Responsibilities:
- Architects solutions to satisfy business and product needs in near and
long term timelines.
- Provides complexity and cost estimation. Develops case studies,
roadmaps and models to influence strategic spending.
- Influences design and development strategies across platforms, teams
and third parties.
- Researches and leads others to research new technology areas. Works
with industry partners to develop new standards.
- Works with staff to develop prototype solutions and/or model solutions
to prove out technology directions. Manages a team that works with
technology licenses creating requirements documents for licensable
technology and provides the test procedures/environment to validate the
device is meeting the requirements
- Contributes to software, hardware, VLSI, firmware processes, design
reviews etc. Contributes to Company's internet portal portfolio in the
form of patents.
- Advises customers and stakeholders in technology related issues in
many areas.
- Leads review of architecture descriptions and requirements.
- Contributes to the continuous improvement of architecture team
processes and standards.
- Represents architecture team in project and governance settings.
- Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters
of significance.
- Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work
nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) as necessary.
- Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.

Job Specification:
- Bachelors Degree or Eqvuivalent
- Engineering, Computer Science
-
- Generally requires 12+ years related experience





Comcast is an EOE/Veterans/Disabled/LGBT employer

jobs.title: Python Developer - Quantitative Equities
jobs.content:
Who we are:
The Equity and Alternatives team within Challenger Life Company uses systematic strategies to deliver superior risk-adjusted returns across a range of asset classes including equities, rates, commodities and currencies. We deal with large amounts of complex (and often messy) data to test hypothetical strategies and then implement these in a robust and systematic manner.


Who you are:
You are a talented developer who lives and breathes code and is excited about writing fast and efficient code to solve problems. You like to make complex things simple. You have a design aesthetic and have worked on projects where you have taken large amounts of data and transformed it into an easily consumable format for users. You enjoy engaging with the users of your products and are talented at taking business requirements and turning them into technical designs. You enjoy working in a team and would prefer to collaborate rather than work in isolation. You are quant and finance curious.


What you will do:
You will be working on developing our quantitative infrastructure to take large amounts of data from a range of sources and make it easily and quickly query-able via an API. This infrastructure will implement our existing strategies and accelerate the research of new strategies. Further down the road you will oversee the implementation of a GUI to rapidly visualise the data we work with; carry on continuous monitoring of our existing strategies; and for rapid prototyping of new strategies.


Apply:
If you are interested in the role please complete the short (15 mins) questionnaire at the following link: http://goo.gl/forms/8g24ObCw6dBmGhIF3

jobs.title: Software Engineer for Large Application Development
jobs.content:
Who we are looking for


We are currently looking for skilled developers experienced with object- oriented programming and Java, C#, or C++ programming languages.We develop in our own object-oriented programming language tailored to our specific needs. With this considered, we value programming skill over years of experience in a particular language or IDE.


If you love programming in an environment with new and challenging problems to solve, then Configura is the right place to apply!

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.content:
Want to work with robots and lazers? Read on!


We're looking to our talented team in Espoo a passionate Full-Stack Developer who lives for beautiful design and User Experience and want to take a lead of our frontend development.


We have multiple challenging frontends, starting from desktop drone controlling GUIs up to the 3D web visualization of results. Now we're looking for person who is capable to take latest web technologies and build beautiful, user friendly UIs and guide other team regarding frontend decisions.


For successful employee this means possibility to be part of the team to build unique large worldwide drone solution with beautiful, realtime user experience!

jobs.title: Full Stack Sr Software Developer
jobs.content:
How would you like to be part of an organization where member values and company values are one and the same? Whose culture encourages and expects employees to advocate for our members -- which has made us the most trusted and respected financial institution throughout the communities we serve and support. That’s BECU—where we put Members First.


We’re looking for dynamic, passionate, engaged employees who value doing what’s right to serve our members – and take pride in knowing that our success depends on everyone who comes to work with us each day.


BECU is Washington’s leading credit union, serving members in the Puget Sound area for 80 years. We know our people are what make us special, and we seek to employ those who want to make a difference. If that’s you, then read on…


The Senior Software Developer (SSD) is responsible for the delivery of solutions that result in a remarkable experience for BECU members within a highly collaborative agile software development environment.  Collaboration is within the team and across teams including working directly with business partners.  The SSD is a catalyst in driving innovation solutions through technical design that allow BECU to differentiate itself in the market.  The SSD also acts as a mentor to less experienced Software Developers.


In this job, you will:


• Perform all responsibilities in accordance with BECU Competencies and Information Protection requirements.
• Design and develop market leading solutions by combining technical expertise with a solid understanding of strategic business drivers to solve complex technology challenges.
• Use technical expertise combined with business acumen to envision what’s possible in solving strategic business challenges using technology to differentiate BECU in the market.  
• Work directly with business unit managers to build prototypes/solutions. 
• Visualizes, articulates and conceptualizes solutions that are consistently recognized as leading the industry within the scope of their team’s accountabilities. 
• Provides thought leadership to drive innovation within their team’s accountabilities. 
• Responsible for complex system analysis, design, coding, testing, debugging and documentation.
• Mentors less experienced team members and facilitates information sharing to support continuous learning within the team. 
• Consistently finds and delivers new ways to develop and improve processes and technology. 
• Internal champion of overall code quality, code reuse and code extensibility.
• Perform additional duties as assigned.

jobs.title: SEO Specialist
jobs.content:
If youâre an SEO professional who is not looking for a new job, then this might be the perfect job for you. MWI is growing like mad, weâve got exciting clients weâre working with, and weâre looking to add SEOs who have a track record of generating real results. When I say real results I mean sales and leads, not merely rankings and traffic. Those are important, but secondary. When we pitch our clients we donât tell them weâre going to help them get lots of good rankings, we tell them weâre going to help them sell a lot of product. Weâre going to assist them to sign up lots of customers for their services. Weâre going to help them grow. We need SEOs who look beyond vanity metrics to deliver the results our clients care about so that our clients say âMy business grew 200% last year and I couldnât have done it without MWI.â Do you want to help great companies do great things? Do you have the right SEO skills to make that happen? Then we want you on our team.

__Responsibilities:__

* Keyword research/strategy using natural language.
